participant_1.background:
I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise.
I enjoy drawing comics for my grandchildren to enjoy.
I love the smell of fresh-cut flowers.
I am glad that my wife's cancer is in remission and that she is able to enjoy the outdoors with me.
i enjoy taking late night walks when its completely dark.

participant_2.background:
I remember getting lost in a library for hours as a child.
My favorite holiday is Halloween because it is a time for fun and celebration.
I was disappointed when my family didn't want to go camping anymore.
I love learning about space and astronomy!
i am studying to become a nurse.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there!
I'm glad to hear that you're studying to become a nurse. I know a lot of people enjoy working in that field!
Thanks! I really like it so far. I'm actually getting ready to start my clinical rotations soon.
Oh, that's exciting! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm a little nervous about it, but I'm also really excited.
I can understand why you're nervous, but I'm sure you'll be fine. You seem like a smart and capable person.
Thanks, I appreciate that!
No problem! So, what are some of your hobbies?
I love to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by Stephen King, but I also enjoy reading biographies and historical fiction.
Those are great choices! I've read a few books by Stephen King, and they're always really good. I've also read some biographies, but I haven't read much historical fiction.
You should try it! It's really interesting to learn about different time periods.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what are some of your favorite things to do outside?
I love to go golfing, go for walks, and spend time in nature.
Those sound like great ways to relax and enjoy the outdoors.
They are! I love being outdoors.
Me too
